-spec number_of_good_subarray_splits(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
number_of_good_subarray_splits(Nums) ->
  Count1s = length([X || X <- Nums, X == 1]),
  number_of_good_subarray_splits(Nums, Count1s, 0, 0, 0).

number_of_good_subarray_splits([], 0, _, Acc, _) ->
  Acc;
number_of_good_subarray_splits([1 | T], Count1s, Current1s, Acc, PrevZeros) when Count1s > 1 ->
  NewAcc = (Acc + (PrevZeros + 1)) rem 1000000007,
  number_of_good_subarray_splits(T, Count1s - 1, Current1s + 1, NewAcc, 0);
number_of_good_subarray_splits([0 | T], Count1s, Current1s, Acc, PrevZeros) when Count1s > 0 ->
  number_of_good_subarray_splits(T, Count1s, Current1s, Acc, PrevZeros + 1);
number_of_good_subarray_splits(_, _, _, Acc, _) ->
  Acc.
